title: Demystifying API Rate Limiting
description: APIs are the ?digital glue? that integrates and connects infrastructure, services, devices, and users. With the proliferation of APIs in almost every organization, it?s essential to have a mechanism in place to manage and govern them. That?s why we introduced Akamai API Gateway, which makes it easier for you to add governance to your APIs.
author: Shantanu Kedar
